name: note-lsm
title: Note LSM
description: Quick note tool to use with the log-structured-merge notation tool
author: conradludgate

commands.name: quick-note
commands.title: Quick Note
commands.subtitle: Quickly jot down something to remember
commands.description: Appends a new note to the end of your note list. There's no editing of notes, just write it down quickly. Take shortcuts here. With the ideas of "Log Structured-Merge", you can merge and curate the notes later when you have time.

preferences.name: cmdPath
preferences.title: Note LSM command
preferences.description: The path executable for Note LSM

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
